description: ベトナム発のAIスタートアップとして2012年創業、2016年に東京本社設立。AIによる文書読み取り・データ化技術を強みとしドキュメントAI「Flax Scanner」を開発。金融・保険・製造業など幅広い業界の業務効率化を支援。アジアNo.1のAI企業を目指しベトナム・台湾にも拠点を展開。累計資金調達額は約50億円。
description_en: AI startup founded in Vietnam in 2012, established Tokyo headquarters in 2016. Specializes in AI-powered document reading and digitization technology, developing document AI 'Flax Scanner'. Supports operational efficiency across finance, insurance, manufacturing and other industries. Expanding across Vietnam and Taiwan aiming to become Asia's #1 AI company. Total funding raised approximately 5 billion yen.
